//http://www.codechef.com/problems/CE02
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,arr[10],i,arr2[10],flag=0;  cin>>t;  long long int n,m,a,b;
	while(t--)
	{	flag=1;
		for(i=0;i<10;i++)
		{
			arr[i]=arr2[i]=0;
		}
		cin>>n>>m;
		while(n>0 && m>0)
		{
			a=n%10; arr[a]++;
			b=m%10;arr2[b]++;
			n/=10; m/=10;
		}
		for(i=0;i<10;i++)
		{
			if(arr[i]!=arr2[i]) 
			{
				flag=0; break;
			}
		}
		cout<<flag<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
